main event: Three rounded red objects were observed flying in the sky for about 17 minutes in Pinewood, South Carolina.
interesting points: The objects were 2-4 feet in diameter and were spaced 1/2 mile apart., Witnesses observed the objects traveling at approximately 400 mph., The objects hovered over a wooded area, then moved south and disappeared., No photographs were taken of the objects during the sighting., The report included a description of a white object with an intermittent trail of orange and red.
witness description: ten civilians including four adults and six children, a Coca-Cola representative and his wife
